title: WEEKEND ENTERTAINMENT Our times seem more horrible than ever Dibakar Banerjee argues escapism is more important than ever
text:
WEEKEND ENTERTAINMENT: 'Our times seem more horrible than ever': Dibakar Banerjee argues escapism is more important than ever 
Daily Mail Saturday 24th October, 2015 
"I don't want to redefine anything. My aims are not so lofty," Bollywood offbeat's poster boy Dibakar Banerjee surprises you with that admission. "I just want to work within a budget and a schedule.?In the process, if I get some notice and acknowledgement, what's the harm?" he quips, the trademark grin in place....
